title: I feel like we're being experimented on here
content: Reflecting on my time at PES over the past few semesters, I can't shake the feeling that we were treated like experimental subjects. The constant changes in timings and test schedules made it seem like we were being experimented on and for what? Juniors don't benefit from it either. Frankly, I believe I could have received a better education at any other college in Karnataka.

comments.body:
Think about the 2020-24 batch, kcet and other extrance exams were postponed due to Covid we joined in December 2020 and kcet batches joined later, were rushed through syllabus through online classes, had to compulsorily come to campus to give exams. Had completed 4 non stop semesters in close to 14 months with hardly a month or two of offline classes. College experimented us with 5 isa, 2 isa system, irregular credit distribution and what not and when we graduate boom recession hits, with close to 30-35% of students still unplaced. 
Here you are crying about timetables, grow up and adjust.
